entities.name: cruciatus curse

entities.name: dementor's kiss
entities.description: a feeling of intense sadness and despair, as described by Professor Snape

entities.name: inferius
entities.description: a type of creature that is used for aggression, as described by Professor Snape

entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: a student in the class who asks a question about an Inferius being seen

relationships.description: The Dark Lord has used Inferi in the past, which means he might use them again
The Dementor's Kiss is a feeling that the Dark Lord causes
